programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: After seeing a vision of her own death at the hands of a supernatural assassin, Baird tries to cheat fate and stop the deadly prophecy from coming true.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.sub-title: And the Tears of a Clown
programme.desc: The librarians investigate a mysterious traveling carnival where they discover the sinister secret of a magician who has been corrupted by the use of real magic.

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.sub-title: And the Trial of the Triangle
programme.desc: In order to stop the spread of pure evil, the team must find the Eye of Ra and unravel the mystery of the Bermuda Triangle; Flynn must pass a series of tests.

programme.desc: The obnoxious Cindy Kroger has suddenly become super-popular thanks to a magical love potion. The Librarians must stop her before she launches a love missile that would force the whole world to becom…

programme.title: The Librarians (2014)
programme.desc: A rash of people spontaneously combusting leads the Librarians to a holistic spa run by vampires, who have discovered the secret to walking in the sun.
